title: peruvadum eppOdu
sahitya:
peruvadum eppOdu pEraruL nI tara marudagiri mIdu uraiyum muruganE nAn


anupallavi

  varadan enrengum paravip-pongum un perumaikku bhangam siridum varAmal


caraNam    pArukku nAn perum bhAramAi irukkAmal bAdhakan ennum hInap-pErum eDukkAmal
yArukkuE apakAram izhaikkAmal un sIraDit-tuNai pENum Arvam izhakkAmal
